I saw the film twice last night. It is about the most amazing thing you will ever see on screen. They did good. Now I'm trying to come up with more money to go back today.

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                                  The new movie is out today. Countdown is 7 hrs until I see it. Seeing
 how this is the most mediatized and awaited event about Transformers
 in years. Let's afficially make this the International Transformers Day.
 
 Happy ITFDay everyone!
 
 PS: I'll let you know about the movie tomorrow. No punchlines, promised!
